summary: Both REQ-12 and REQ-13 are substantially implemented. REQ-13 covers all required WhatsApp redirects across navigation, login/register, game cards, promo cards, footer links, social icons, hero carousel CTAs, and stats bar items. REQ-12 covers viewport entrance animations, staggered card reveals, hover effects, navigation transitions, and hero carousel animated text overlays. The implementation appears complete against all stated acceptance criteria.
